title: Looking for a team
body:
I'm just a normal erry day league player looking to play a couple of ranked 5 games, I login most days but i can't commit to a full on "OMG must be on by 5:30 every day for at least 4 hours" type of deal. I'm Currently gold, could probably get higher but i hit gold and got scared of losing the end of season rewards. 22, been playing league since 09 i think? not sure this game has been around for ages. xin was the first champ out when i started

Tl:DR.
want to play 5's
On most day's 
Not commiting to a schedule
Gold

replies.body:
Me too, looking for a serius team, i can play everyday and im main jungler or suport, but i can play also adc.
My nickname "cordellat" add me and lets make some plays.
